Pupil / Teacher ratio{1985 }33/1{28%}Service 31 school meals daily Pupils move on to{Courtmoor School}at 11.It is a Scola design building. t.v. and v.c.r. {Tweseldown Infants {1973-17}pupils.{1985-218}(87 girls,131 boys) Pupil/Teacher ratio 33/1{50% Service children 25 school meals daily semi-open plan design.Aver35 play-time accidents weekly.School day{8:55}am {3:30}pm.Mid-day break 1 hour 20 mins. {Crookham Infants {1863-215}pupils in 4 classes{1985-139 in{4\}classes (66 girls,73 boys) 45 school meals daily Pupil / Teacher ratio 33/1 traditional design class-rooms 8-10 children suffer from asthma t.v and v.c.r school day {8:40}am{-3:15}pm.
